participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and outgoing, loves to try new experiences and enjoys relaxing activities.
participant_1.background: My first purchase was a stuffed animal cat when I was four. I'm interested in learning more about how to use social media to advertise my business. I have always had long hair. I love trying out new things, even if they are out of my comfort zone. Not a day goes by that I do not drink four mountain dews.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Energetic and social, enjoys outdoor activities and values personal time for relaxation.
participant_2.background: I love to dance my heart out at concerts when I have free time. I enjoy golfing. I have a truck for my weekend adventures and a leased car for my daily commute. I am from Austin, Texas. I am not a morning person but my peace and quiet is important to me.

content.text: Hey there! How are you?
Good! Thanks for asking! I'm ready for the weekend!
Me too! I'm excited to relax and catch up on some tv.
Sounds like a good plan! Are you watching anything good right now?
I'm just starting a new show called "This Is Us". Have you heard of it?
No, I haven't! What's it about?
It's about a family of three siblings who are all very different from each other. It's really good!
Oh, that sounds interesting! I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's on NBC.
Cool! Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to dance! I'm actually part of a dance troupe.
That's so cool! What kind of dancing do you do?
We do a variety of styles, but our main focus is hip-hop.
Oh, that's awesome! I love hip-hop!
Me too! It's so much fun!
Do you guys perform at any competitions or anything?
Yes, we do! We've actually won a few awards.
That's amazing! You must be really good!
Thanks! We've been practicing for a long time.
Well, it definitely shows!
Thanks
